name: xpipe
tagline: A unified interface for managing remote connections
description: xpipe is a self-hosted tool and GUI for managing remote connections and development environments. It centralizes SSH, containers, and tunneling, giving developers a consistent interface across projects and machines.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Store and organize SSH, Docker, Kubernetes, and other remote connections in a unified interface

features.title: File Browser
features.description: Navigate remote filesystems with a graphical file manager that supports drag-and-drop transfers

features.title: Tunnel Management
features.description: Create and manage SSH tunnels and port forwards through an intuitive visual interface

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Securely store passwords, SSH keys, and certificates with encrypted local storage

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export and import connection profiles to share configurations across teams or devices
